A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A film that I wanted to like so badly. A film where I waited patiently the whole time expecting it to get better. But it did not. Disney has taken its grasp on the series with unneccesary comedy\, pointless characters/scenes\, cheesy dialogue\, and a predictable plot. It seems exaggerated\, but I feel cheated by paying money to see this film. Cheated to see a series that I adored turn into what it is. I appreciated the Force Awakens and even remotely enjoyed it. I appreciated this films willingness to add new material. But it doesn't make up for the fact that the movie is so poorly written and predictable.
